original_title: GV: Shoot to Live Gunfight Survival
overview: Massad Ayoob is recognized worldwide as an expert in the use of firearms for self-defense and law enforcement. This program is an in-depth interview with Ayoob about how to survive an on-the-street gunfight. Hard-hitting, practical, witty information about where to shoot an offender for maximum stopping power. .45 vs. 9mm vs .22 calibers, training vs. real life, what happens when you get shot and lots more.
title: GV: Shoot to Live Gunfight Survival
